I'm also in need of a highly-rated hotel in Paris that fits the budget (assuming two meals) based on its minimum price. Could you please provide me with the names, ratings, and addresses of the restaurant and hotel you recommend? Thank you so much!

<function_thought>
The user's query requires recommendations for a restaurant and a hotel in Paris, both of which should cater to a budget of 500 euros, considering the user will be needing meals for lunch and dinner. The next logical step is to find all restaurants in Paris to identify one that serves authentic French cuisine with top ratings. Following that, I will also query for all hotels in Paris to identify a highly-rated option. Both lists will be necessary for further analysis.
</function_thought>

<function_call>[get_all_restaurants_in_city(city="Paris"), get_all_hotels_in_city(city="Paris")]</function_call>
